name: .MXM File Extension
summary: Learn about .MXM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Material description used by Maxwell Render, a photorealistic rendering application; describes a material based on the physics of the surface in the real world; used for setting the surface appearance of 3D objects in a Maxwell scene (.MXS file).

content: Maxwell materials help give surfaces a realistic appearance. For example, an MXM file could store a wood or chrome material that contains texture and light properties that make the surface look like the real-world material.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
